name: ecommerce-ux-commands
description: Ecommerce UX and Baymard-style guideline commands

commands.name: ecom-product-grid
commands.description: Audit product grid/listing against Baymard-style guidelines: image link, visible price, clear CTA, rating/availability, structure.

parameters.name: html_or_url
parameters.description: HTML content, file path, or URL of the product listing.

example_output.checklist_results: Image linked, price visible, CTA present, semantic structure
example_output.fix_suggestions: List of gaps and HTML/structure fixes

commands.name: ecom-cart-checkout
commands.description: Audit cart and checkout for line items, totals, edit/remove, guest checkout, progress, and trust signals.

parameters.name: flow_description_or_html
parameters.description: Description of the flow or HTML/path for cart and checkout.

example_input.flow_description_or_html: Cart page with line items and Checkout CTA

commands.name: ecom-trust-signals
commands.description: Suggest trust signals (security badges, return policy, reviews, guarantees) and where to place them (listing, PDP, cart, checkout).

parameters.name: page_type
parameters.description: Page or context: listing | PDP | cart | checkout.

commands.name: ecom-baymard-summary
commands.description: Return a concise summary of Baymard-style ecommerce UX guidelines for a topic (product listing, PDP, cart, checkout, search, filters).

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topic: product listing | PDP | cart | checkout | search | filters.

commands.example_output: Markdown summary with key checklist items and source note.
